model.process

Class WeatherDayFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.process.WeatherDayFacade

  • public class WeatherDayFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    It's the interface to WeatherDay class. Through this class it's possible to access the logic and data within WeatherDay.
    Author:
    Patrick M Lima

        public boolean readRangeDays(java.lang.String dtInitial,
                             java.lang.String dtFinal)
        Reads a range of days (beginning in dInitial and ending in dFinal, including it) to process their data
        Parameters:
        dtInitial - first day to read
        dtFinal - last day to read
        Returns:
        true if the days were find and processed, false otherwise
